Of all gunblades (a sword-gun weapon), the finest
model is the Lionheart.
It requires rare items to be remodeled to its
highest quality.  Good luck!

Next, we show you the finest projectile weapon,
the Shooting Star.
Don't let the angel wing motif fool you.
It's a deadly weapon.

Exeter comes to mind when considering high-
powered guns.
Despite its simple design, it's a fine weapon made
of many rare metals.
This Strange Vision is famous for its ability to hit\na target with perfect accuracy.\nIt's also famous for its rarity.

This time, we introduce a basic weapon.
The gunblade's original model is this Revolver.
What it lacks in power, it more than makes up for
with its reliability.

A punch can be a deadly weapon, but it can be
made even more effective by wearing these, the
Metal Knuckle.
These gloves are widely used.

Even a weakling can cause serious damage
with this type of nunchaku, but they're
also hard to use.  This Flail has long been
a favorite for beginners.

Whips are effective against enemies that are close
or far away.
This Chain Whip has a simple design, but is very
reliable in battle.
An improvement in power over the Revolver, Shear\nTrigger uses the same blade as the Revolver, but\nthe gun aspect is now more powerful.

With the Maverick, the combatant can deliver direct
punching blows to the enemy.
The gloves are made of black leather and have
metal plates on the knuckles.

Weapons that can be used from a distance have
many advantages.
The Pinwheel is one of the more basic projectile
weapons.

Guns have the advantage of range, but damage is
less compared to swords.
The Valiant uses powerful bullets to cause damage
comparable to a sword.
This Cutting Trigger is the latest model of\ngunblade, made by replacing the blade of the\nRevolver with the powerful Cutting Sword.
Valkyrie is a projectile weapon that can fly\nstraight at the enemy using its stabilizing fins.\nThe blade is extremely deadly.

The Ulysses lacks style, but is a quality rifle with
tremendous firepower.
The inelegant design was necessary to absorb the
powerful recoil after firing.

This whip, the Slaying Tail, is known for its
tremendous speed and power.
It is named after Sleipner, the horse of the
legendary GF, Odin.

The Flame Saber got its name from its red blade.
This gunblade is very similar to the Shear Trigger.
The only difference is that it has the Cutting
Trigger's handle.
The Gauntlet is covered with layers of steel.\nIt is a fighting glove for delivering heavy rather\nthan smooth blows.

The ends of the Morning Star were equipped with
spiked metal balls to cause more damage.
It is a plain weapon, similar to nunchaku, but it is
fairly effective.

The Red Scorpion is a unique whip made of rare
materials.
It's strength comes from the dragon skin, while it's
flexibility comes from the Ochu tentacle.

The Twin Lance is a gunblade forged with two
blades.  The two blades work synergistically to
inflict severe damage.
The only drawback is its heavy weight.

The Rising Sun is similar to a circular saw.
It is made by upgrading the Pinwheel.
It is capable of slicing into enemies like a spinning
saw and dealing a devastating blow.

Contrary to the Ulysses, the Bismarck has a sleek
look.  The rifle is very handy and light, but in turn,
requires more physical strength and energy to
handle its powerful recoil.
The Crescent Wish is an extremely powerful\nnunchaku.\nSome rare items are required to forge this weapon.

The Punishment looks almost identical to the Twin
Lance, but it is lighter and more powerful.
The only gunblade more powerful than this is the
Lionheart.
Ehrgeiz is the most powerful fighting glove.\nIt allows the wearer to deliver optimal hits based\non his or her ability.

The Cardinal is the latest line of projectile weapons.
The wide fins provide more stability and accuracy
compared to the Valkyrie.
Its greater accuracy causes more damage.

Save the Queen is the most powerful whip in the
world.
It is made with Malboro's tentacles which are the
most ideal material for making whips.
Combat King 001            Sea Power!  Dolphin Blow

Do you guys know what a Dolphin is?
It's an adorable gray mammal that lives in the
ocean.
This skill, called the {Blue}Dolphin Blow{White}, draws out the
secret power of the dolphin.
It'll give the enemy a hell of a show!
Study the skill carefully.\nRemember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?\n
Combat King 002          Power Blow!  Meteor Strike

Picking up your enemy and slamming them on the
ground probably does the most damage.
That's what {Blue}Meteor Strike{White} accomplishes.
And, of course, the bigger they are, the harder
they fall.

This is one of the hardest moves to do, but
study it carefully and you'll eventually get it.
Remember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?
Combat King 003         Final blow!  Meteor Barret

As a fighter, you will occasionally encounter near-
death experiences.
Using {Blue}Meteor Barret{White} in these situations may be
your only chance to emerge victorious.
It is a skill that throws all your energy against
the enemy.

Being a finishing blow, it inflicts tremendous damage
against the enemy.
Remember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?
Combat King 004       Aerial Finish!  Different Beat

The enemy can't do anything if you lift them up in
the air.
With {Blue}Different Beat{White}, you can kick the enemy up in
the air and keep kicking them while they remain
completely defenseless.

This is really an efficient skill so it's worthwhile
to get it down.
Remember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?
Combat King 005     Super Dash!  My Final Heaven

E = 1/2 x M x V x V  E: Energy.  M: Mass.
V: Velocity.  Apparently, if you increase the
velocity, the energy goes up.
This skill is based on this physics equation.
At a velocity near the speed of light, you can
do major damage!

Get this skill, {Blue}My Final Heaven{White}, down and check out
the high-speed thrashing!
Remember, always use it for a good cause, ok!?

Welcome to Pet Pals.
We bring the latest pet news to dog
lovers.
Your dog learns a trick to damage
enemies in this issue.
Your dog comes to your rescue when
you are in grave danger.
It's called...
  {Blue}{Angelo} Strike{White}!
As you dog lovers already know, walk with your
dog to help him learn this trick.

Have you ever wished your pet could
rescue you in battle?
This is just the trick for your dog to
learn!
Your dog finds and uses potions and
other cures on a member who's near
KO with this trick.
It is called
  {Blue}{Angelo} Recover{White}!
A very nice trick, indeed.

Research shows a relationship between
the moon and your dog.
Do you know how your dog can use the
power of the moon to help you?
It's...
  {Blue}Invincible Moon{White}!
The moon's mysterious power can
make all allies invincible.
Do a lot of walking with your dog to help him learn
this trick!

Have you ever been KO'd by a
monster?
Even reviving doesn't help, because
you get KO'd right back.
To answer your desperate call for
help,
use
  {Blue}{Angelo} Reverse{White}!
Your dog finds Phoenix Downs to
revive KO'd party members in battle.

Item hunting!
Sounds like a daunting task?
But it's true that you need items to
do anything.
So let's have your dog learn another
trick.
It's...
  {Blue}{Angelo} Search{White}!
Your dog finds items while you are fighting.
Be sure to praise your dog when s/he finds an
item!

Have you ever wanted to achieve a
goal together with your pet?
Make it come true, using
  {Blue}Wishing Star{White}!
Attack enemies together!
The power of love multiplies your
powers by 10 to 20 times to defeat
your enemies.
Try it, you'll like it!

A status window showing the character, HP, and
ATB gauges is displayed on the battle screen.
 Characters can act once the ATB gauge is full.

Commands are displayed when
the ATB is full.
 Use the directional buttons to
choose.
 Press {X} to confirm the
command.
 Press {START} while the cursor
is on-screen to see a help
message.

To use {Blue}Magic{White}, select one
magic and choose your
target.
 The number in stock is
indicated next to the
magic's name.
 The {LimitBreakArrow} indicates that the
magic is junctioned.

When {Blue}Item{White} is chosen,
select the item and its
target.
 The number next to
each item shows how
many items the party
has.

{Blue}GF{White} summons a GF
junctioned to a
character.
Select a GF and its
target.
 The number next
to the GF's name
shows its HP.

{Blue}Draw{White} extracts magic
from enemies.
 Choose a target and
magic, then {Blue}Stock{White} or
{Blue}Cast{White}.
 {Blue}Stock{White} will stock the
magic and {Blue}Cast{White} will cast
the magic.

may appear next to {Blue}Attack{White}.
 Press the right directional
button.

powerful than the usual
{Blue}Attack{White}.

The cards originated
when a psychic named
Orlan modified these tarot
cards for games.
The game became popular
with soldiers passing time 
between battles.
As its popularity spread, each region developed its\nown rules and picture variations.\n

1.Picture
2.Numbers
  Correspond to the 4
  sides of the card.
  (1:weak - A:strong)
3.Element
  Some rules allow
  the players to use
  its elemental property.

1.Battle area
  Place cards here one at
  a time.
2.Elemental
  Some rules indicate
  elements on the board.

Cards are placed in turn,
and the player with the
most cards when all 9
areas are filled wins.

Choose 5 cards before
you begin.
Pay attention to numbers
and elements.

1.Card name
2.# in stock
3.Page number
4.Card chosen

{Blue}Same{White} turns over cards
that have same # values
on 2 or more sides.
In the example, #s 4 and
1 are adjacent to top
and left sides.
This turns over the top
and left cards.

{Blue}Plus{White} means that cards
adding to the same # on
more than 2 adjacent
sides are turned over.
In the example, the cards
placed add up to 7 on the
top and left sides.
The cards on top and left
are turned over.

Cards turned over using
{Blue}Same{White} or {Blue}Plus{White} turn over
adjacent cards in {Blue}Combo{White}.
In the example, red will 
be turned over because
1 of the 2 cards turned
over is a larger #.

{Blue}Same Wall{White} uses Battle
Area wall (the frame) as
1 of card's 4 sides when
using {Blue}Same{White} rule.
Wall is assumed to have
‘A' value on all sides.

{Blue}Elemental{White} changes the #
value of the card depending
on the elemental property.
When a card and slot match
elemental properties, the
# value increases by 1.
If elements don't match,
the card loses 1 from the
original # value.

Cards are traded when the game is over.
The winner takes 1 card from the loser in the
basic trade rule {Blue}One{White}.
There are many trade rules besides {Blue}One{White}.
Pay attention to trade rules before you begin
a game.

Mog, a MiniMog, wants to go
treasure hunting with his
friends.
But the treasure is in the
‘Scary Mountain'.
Everybody tells Mog, “We're
not going!  It's too scary!”
But Mog wants to go so badly.\nNo one can stop him now!

Mog finally decided to go by
himself.
Then... Two days passed...
Three days passed.
Mog did not come home.
Moomba and Cactuar imagined
Mog being barbecued by the
Demon King.\n“We have to go help Mog with Chicobo!”
Moomba said, “I'll find weapons!”\nCactuar said, “I'll find treasures!”\nWhat's Chicobo doing with a TV and Fishing Pole?

{Green}Junction{White} equips GF and Magic.
Referred to as: Junctioning GF to a character.
“Magic junctioned to a character” and
“GF junctioned to a character” fall under this
category.
Junction enables a character to use Magic and
summon GF.

{Green}GF{White} signifies {Green}Guardian Force{White}.

As allies, they provide the ability to use magic
and commands.
They can also be summoned to fight in a battle.

GF also gains levels with EXP as you do, and learn
abilities with AP.

{Green}EXP{White} signifies experience points gained in battle
by characters and GF.
Levels go up after gaining EXP.
Damaging an enemy gives EXP.
The amount of EXP received changes according
to the difference in character and enemy level.
Higher level enemies are worth more, lower level
enemies are worth less.
The character or the GF to give the final blow
receives bonus EXP.

{Green}AP{White} signifies {Green}Ability Point{White}.

GF receive AP by defeating enemies.
AP is used by GF to learn abilities.
Once enough AP are gained, GF learns the ability
being studied.

Attacks are categorized into physical and magic
attacks.
Physical attack means damaging an enemy with
a sword or other physical weapons.
Magic attack means damaging an enemy with
magical force.

These differences come into play in order to
attack enemies effectively.

Every character carries magic.
Magic stock decreases when used.
Raise stats by junctioning magic to them.

There are 3 ways to obtain magic:
 ·Draw it from enemies.
 ·Draw it from draw points.
 ·Refine it from items.

One of the battle commands.
This command allows allies to draw magic from
enemies.
When drawing, choose either {Blue}Stock{White} to store the
magic, or {Blue}Cast{White} to use it.
A character at a high level can draw magic more
efficiently than a character at a low level.
Some magic cannot be drawn unless a character
is at a high level.

Stock is one of the draw commands.
The command allows characters to store drawn
magic for future use.
It is possible to draw up to 9 units of magic per
draw.

Cast is one of the draw commands.
The command allows casting of drawn magic.
The effect of the magic on the target is random.
Draw and cast can only use 1 unit of magic.

A limit break is a special skill characters can use
in dire situations.
Each character has his/her own special attacks.
These moves do a lot of damage against an enemy.

Every character has 9 stats:
Hit Points, Strength, Vitality, Magic, Spirit, Speed,
Evade, Hit, and Luck.
The values assigned to the stats reflect their level.

{Green}HP{White} signifies {Green}Hit Points{White}.
HP represents the life force of the character.
Zero HP represents KO.

The value of Strength determines the degree of
damage caused by a {Blue}physical attack{White}.
The higher the Strength, the greater the damage
to the enemy.

The value of Vitality determines the degree of
damage a character can endure from a physical
attack.
A character with high Vitality suffers less damage
from physical attacks.

The value of Magic determines the degree of
damage caused by a magic attack.
Higher Magic causes more magical damage.
The chance of successfully casting magic that
cause status abnormalities becomes higher if your
magic level is high.
A high Magic level also allows you to restore more
HP with healing magic like Cure.

The value of Spirit determines the degree of
damage a character can endure from a magic
attack.
A character with high Spirit suffers less damage
from magic attacks.

The value of Speed determines the speed of the
character's ATB meter.
It takes the character a shorter time to act if
this value is high.

Luck affects numerous actions of the character
in the game.
For example, having a higher value for Luck is
an advantage during battle.

The value for Evade determines the character's
ability to dodge physical attacks.
Characters that have high Evade can dodge
physical attacks more easily.

The value for Hit determines the accuracy of a
physical attack.
Accuracy increases as the Hit level increases.
However, your target's evade level can affect the
accuracy of your physical attack.

One of the GF abilities learned through acquiring
AP.
Ability enables characters to use commands and
special powers, but you must junction GF first.

There are many abilities with different functions,
in roughly 6 categories.

·These abilities allows junctioning of magic to
  stats, elements, and status.
 ·Junction a GF that has learned the ability and
  set character ability to activate it.

·Allows selection of commands in battle.

·Abilities that give specialized powers.

  set character ability to activate it.
 ·Signified by the {MenuAbility} icon in the menu.

·Abilities that give the party special powers.
 ·Junction a GF that has learned the ability and
  set character ability to activate it.
 ·Signified by the {Fire} icon in the menu.

·Abilities that power up GF.

·Abilities that take effect in the menu.

{Green}Elemental{White} is a physical attribute.
There are Fire, Ice, Thunder, Earth, Poison, Wind,
Water, and Holy elements.
This means that Fire magic has Fire properties,
Ice monsters have ice properties, etc.
Damage varies depending on elemental properties.

There is also a non-elemental property.
Non-elemental is not influenced by other elements.

Signifies junctioning magic to Elem-Atk.
Only magic with an elemental property can be
junctioned.
Once junctioned, {Blue}Attack{White} has an elemental property.
An elemental stat is at maximum at 100%.
When attacking an enemy that is susceptible to Fire
attacks, a character inflicts twice the damage if
that character's Fire stat is at 100%.
But at 50%, damage only amounts to 1.5 times.

{Green}Elem-Def{White} signifies Elemental Defense, which sets
an elemental property to your defense.
Certain elemental attacks can be defended against
depending on your Elem-Def element.
Fire Elem-Def protects against fire attacks.
Fire attacks can heal characters who are
completely immune to fire.
Characters who are weak against fire are easily
damaged by fire attacks.

{Green}Status{White} signifies status effects, such as Poison
and Petrify.
Status Change means change in a character's
status.
Besides status like Poison and Petrify, which have
negative effects, there are status changes like
Protect and Double, which benefit the character.
Status changes occur to both enemies and allies.

{Green}ST-Atk{White} signifies attacks with status change
or which have status change added to them.
After setting status change to an attack, the
attack will change an enemy's status.
Most magic has a status change, such as Sleep,
which causes the Sleep status.

{Green}ST-Def{White} signifies status defense, either already
in use, or actually setting a status to defense.
This defends against certain status changes.
If attacked by Petrify while the defense is set
against Petrify, a status change doesn't occur.

KO means that the character's HP is 0 and s/he is
disabled in battle.  Death is KO caused by a status
change.  The status remains after battle.

A country on the world's smallest continent.
Known for its temperate climate and warm people.
Balamb Garden adds a school-town feel to this
country.
A cavern near Balamb Garden where a Fire element\nGF lives.\n

A small country on the eastern coast of Galbadia
continent (formerly Dollet).
Remnants of an ancient empire.

A city located south of Dollet in the forest area.
It was an independent country before neighboring
country Galbadia invaded 18 years ago.
There are numerous resistance groups fighting for
independence to this day.

All forms of communication now use HD cables.
No radio transmissions are used.
Timber TV Station keeps its radio systems, waiting
for the day radio transmission is restored.

Ruled under the military dictatorship of President
Vinzer Deling, this country continues to expand its
territory.
Countless invasions of other countries are
attempted, but most are deterred by SeeD.
Deling City is its capital.

column5:
the burial place of
Dollet Empire's last emperor.
The tomb remains nameless due to the ancient
belief that calling a dead king by his name brings
bad luck.
There are uncomfirmed reports that a GF resides
inside, as well as other monsters.
|

Text:
A small town outside of Galbadia.
It is actually a small village.
Sorceress Adel of Esthar ordered attacks on this
village several times.

Located in the desert south of Deling City,
all people deemed dangerous by the government
are sent to this facility.
It has become a symbol of President Deling's
fascist policies.

Galbadia's long-range missile base.
As the only country to own long range missiles with
the exception of Esthar, they pose a major security
threat to the world.
It is believed that the missiles are armed with a
target-lock mechanism.
The details are unknown.

A railroad that connected the East and West
continents.
Completed about the time war broke out, it was only
in use a short time.
Since then it has been derelict.

A station located in the center of Horizon Bridge.
It's now a haven for expatriates who refused to
have their skills exploited by the government.

A country on the northern continent.
Due to the harsh climate, Moombas and the Shumi
tribe are the only occupants.
Trabia Garden students and faculty also reside
here.

Founded by people who immigrated to a continent
east of Centra around the same time Dollet Empire
was founded.
The mild climate and temperament of the people
soon gave way to scientific advancement.

Started the Sorceress War and fought against the
world under Adel's rule.
Their sorceress and their scientific powers posed
a worldwide threat.
After abruptly declaring an end to the war, Esthar
closed its borders and has kept its silence ever
since.
No details are known.

Governed by President Laguna and his aides.
Due to their concern over Dr. Odine's inventions
having a negative effect on the state of world
security, they closed off their country for 17
years.
It is very likely that President Laguna will be
criticized for keeping silent for so long.
A station on the Esthar side of Horizon Bridge.\nIt is currently abandoned.\n

A lake on the Esthar continent.
What used to be a beautiful lake is now a barren
field.
It's speculated that Esthar's experiments led to
the lake's destruction.

A world of monsters.
Many works of art and epics about the moon
throughout history are evidence of its mystical
powers.

A man-made mobile island for marine life research.
Disappeared mysteriously after much wandering.
Since the facility members are still alive, it is
assumed to be concealed intentionally.

4141 Call this place Deep Sea Deposit
4242 Seal off Deep Sea Deposit

Marine Research Island's last excavation site.
Believed to be an ocean floor ruin.

By examining the Draw Points in the field and on
the world map, you can draw magic.
The Draw Points on the World Map are completely
hidden.
Examine odd-looking areas carefully.

A complete mystery.  Various states of “present”
are believed to become compressed.
Sorceress' power from many generations may cross
over to give 1 sorceress great strength.
No one knows what effect this may have on regular
human beings.

Balamb Garden was founded 12 years ago, followed
by Galbadia and Trabia Gardens.
Each Garden has an administrator, called Master,
and a headmaster.
Balamb Garden's Headmaster Cid was the founder
of the Garden.

Balamb Garden's mercenary force.
Students 15 and older can participate in the
written and field exams.
They must pass both exams to become SeeD.
SeeD members are paid by the Garden according to
their rank.
In the Garden, their status is no different from
that of the other students.

SeeD conducts missions around the world.
Most missions involve battle support and undercover
work.
SeeD is in high demand by groups requiring a small
force of undercover specialists.
Commissions made through such dispatches are an
important part of Balamb Garden's income.

SeeD battle operations are noted for their skillful
use of para-magic.
Balamb Garden researches the use of GF in
conjunction with para-magic.
For this, Balamb Garden SeeD members master the
most powerful forms of para-magic.
Shows your skill level as a SeeD.\nHigher ranks command a higher salary.\n

Exam to test your SeeD knowledge.
After becoming a SeeD, you can take the tests in
the Tutorial.
There are up to 30 levels, with 10 questions each.
All answers must be correct to go up a rank.
However, you can only takes tests up to
{Squall}'s level.

A haven for orphans founded by Sorceress Edea
and Headmaster Cid.
Named for their wish to raise the seeds of the
future in their garden.

A phenomenon beginning with Esthar's silence 17
years ago.
Almost all radio communication facilities were shut
down because of noise across all frequencies.
However, short transmissions are still possible.
Believed to have some relation to the moon, but
details are unknown.

Most countries now communicate through the use
of HD cables running underground.
However, many of these cables are cut off by
monsters or in battle.
Many countries are left without any means to
communicate with each other.

Refers to monsters falling from the moon.
Completely destroyed the cities of Centra.
Occurs when monsters reach a saturation point on
the moon.
It's believed that there are factors on the planet
that cause this phenomenon.
This phenonmenon has occured many times in
history and will reoccur in the future.

Creatures on the moon.  Monsters fall to earth at
regular intervals.
This phenomenon is called the Lunar Cry.
The monsters bred on the planet since the last
Lunar Cry make up those roaming the planet at this
time.
The Lunar Cry phenomenon also transformed some
animals into monsters.

A civilization in Centra 4000 years ago.
These Centra people immigrated to other continents
and founded the Dollet Empire to the west and
Esthar to the east.
Centra was destroyed 80 years ago by the Lunar
Cry.

A device to restrain sorceresses' power.
Dr. Odine, afraid of Sorceress Adel's power,
created it.
It looks like beautiful jewelry.

The legend goes that the Great Hyne created
people.
The sorceresses were given a fragment of Hyne's
own power.
It's hard to determine how many sorceresses exist
today, for many keep their powers concealed.
However, it is believed that they avoid spreading
their power too thin.

Sorceress power has been passed throughout
history by the process of embodiment.
Any person who has the capacity to embody the
great sorceress power is a candidate.

When a sorceress is about to die, she gives her
power to the next person who ‘inherits' her
sorceress powers.
According to Odine's research, the power tends to
weaken with each succession.

A crystal that causes the Lunar Cry by producing
a strong energy field between the planet and the
moon.
It's believed to have originated in the moon.
The Crystal Pillar responds to a specific location
on the planet, and sends a strong directional signal.
More research is required to analyze this process
in detail.

An enclosure for Crystal Pillar made by Esthar.
3 miles tall and 1.5 miles wide, the enormous
enclosure boasts a high-tech facility.
It floats by causing a reaction with the Crystal
Pillar.
A stone from the moon is sealed inside.
It was probably built to cause the Lunar Cry
through artificial means.

Lunar Cry's point of origin determined by Esthar
scientists.
A security box restraining the power of the Crystal
Pillar and ground energy field is set up.
It is sealed to prevent the Crystal Pillar from
entering the area.

A high-tech device intended for weakening and
confining a sorceress' power.
Shot into the moon's orbit after going through a
special sealing process.
Used to confine Sorceress Adel.
It is the main cause of radio interference on the
planet.

Esthar's space shuttle.
Based on an ancient Centra legend of the Dragon
Ship,
Esthar's finest scientific technology was used to
build it.
Esthar's flagship, until it was used to send Adel's
Tomb into space.

Balamb Garden's foundation.
The original structure of Centra Shelter remains
almost entirely intact.
